products.title: Sio Merino Navy Roller Blind
products.description: Their sio collection intruduces stylish modern patterns to your window dressing. Their sio meriono navy will make a chic addition to your home. Pair with dark wooden tones throughout the home for a look that can not be surpassed. The polyester fabric is decorative whilst providing a sleek and practical window covering. Product id: sdb-rbx2325 fabric colour: merino navy material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes sio merino navy roller blind in blue.

products.title: Bari Spc Merino - Roller Blind
products.description: Perfect for creating a sophisticated look, the exquisite bari spc in merino features an elegant shade of cream on a resilient cloth adorned with textured stitching. This graceful blind also offers a valuable solar protective coating which helps to keep the room at a comfortable temperature, whatever the time of year. Present the merino in your master bedroom with a soothing palette of creamy tones and compelling golden hues.
